feed.title: Nan Pu
feed.subtitle: Recently, I am a postdoctoral researcher at the Multimedia and Human Understanding Group (MHUG) of University of Trento and working with Prof. Nicu Sebe. Previously, I got Ph.D. degree from Leiden University in 2022 and supervised by Prof. Michael Lew. During my Ph.D. study, I worked with Dr. Zhun Zhong and Dr. Yu Liu.
